
add_custom_command (
  OUTPUT  VDviEncoder.cpp
          VDviEncoder.h
          VDviEncoder__Syms.cpp
          VDviEncoder__Syms.h
  DEPENDS DviEncoder.v
  COMMAND perl ${VERILATOR} ${VERILATOR_OPTS} -Mdir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR} -cc
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/DviEncoder.v
    ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/video/tmds/ctl-encoder-2to10/src/CtlEncoder2to10.v
    ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/video/tmds/rgb-encoder-8to10/src/RgbEncoder8to10.v
)

# Verilog .v files are added here so that they get added to any IDE project generated by CMake.
add_library (VDviEncoder STATIC VDviEncoder.cpp VDviEncoder__Syms.cpp
    DviEncoder.v
)

target_compile_options(VDviEncoder PRIVATE ${VK_CPPFLAGS})

target_include_directories(VDviEncoder PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})

target_link_libraries(VDviEncoder verilated)
